dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, I smell the stench of darkness about you, Zarathos. What business does a Shadow Conqueror have in the realm of the Grand Avatar?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm here to annihilate any and all who stand in my way. You will fall like the others, Aetheris.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words from an infernal wretch. Do you truly believe you are capable of defeating me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't believe; I know. Prepare yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish confidence. Your end is nigh.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: With my power, your light will be snuffed out like a candle in the wind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance will be your undoing. We shall see whose light gets extinguished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to parley. A force as formidable as yours could be a useful ally.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An ally? You are bold to even suggest such a thing. What could you possibly offer an entity like myself?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and we shall plunge the world into eternal twilight, stamping out the Guardians of Light together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting proposal, but your motives reek of desperation. I'd rather watch you fail.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we could form an unstoppable force, ruling over the Darkened Veil.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You think too highly of yourself, Zarathos. I have no desire for such an alliance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, phantom. I have more urgent concerns than dealing with a mere shadow like you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mere shadow? You underestimate my power. Few dare to speak thus and live to tell the tale.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Threats mean nothing to one born of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then I shall show you the true meaning of terror.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for your games, Aetheris. Begone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flee then, coward. But do not think I will forget your insolence.
